DtvPvrPlay1

Provides facilities to control PVR playback in terms of trick modes, play, pause and stop.

Ports

  • [In] get:

  • [In] play:

  • [In] pause:

  • [In] pos:

  • [Out] pause:

  • [Out] rev:
